title: kaliyugadalli hari
sahitya:
kaliyugadalli harinAmava nenedare kula kOTigaLuddharisuvadu rangA


anupallavi

  sulabhada muktige sulabhanendenisuva jalaruha nAbhana nene manavE


caraNam 1    snAnvariyenu maunavariyenu dhyAnavariyenenthanena bEDA 
jAnakI vallabha dasharatha nandana gAnalOlana nene manavE
    caraNam 2    mantravanriyenu yantravariyenu tantravariyenantaleya bEDA 
santata nityAnandana nAmava cintegaLillade nene manavE
    caraNam 3    japavondariyenu tapavondariyenu upavAsavanendaleya bEDA 
apAra mahima shrI purandara viTTalana upAyadindali nene manavE
